advancements.carbonado.root.title: Carbonado Mod
advancements.carbonado.carbonado.title: Stronger than Diamond
advancements.carbonado.carbonado.descrip:
Obtain a Carbonado. Try checking inside Bedrock.
Also you might need something explosive to extract it.
advancements.carbonado.upgrade.title: Forging Equipment
advancements.carbonado.upgrade.descripti: Diamond Equipment and some Carbonado in an Anvil will create upgraded Equipment!
advancements.carbonado.armor.title: Man in Black
advancements.carbonado.armor.description: Obtain a full set of Carbonado armor.
advancements.carbonado.sword.title: Not That Shiny, but Sharp
advancements.carbonado.tools.title: Yep, the Hoe too
advancements.carbonado.tools.description: Obtain a full set of Carbonado Tools (yep, the Hoe too).
advancements.carbonado.hoe.title: Even more dedication
advancements.carbonado.shard.title: Double Explosion
advancements.carbonado.shard.description: After extracting Carbonado with TNT try to make it blow up.
advancements.carbonado.glass.title: Looking at the Dark
advancements.carbonado.glass.description:
Smelt the shards and use them to get Carbonado Reinforced Glass.
You can make Panes too.
